verses.verse: Then the LORD <S%H3068><s%> said <S%H559><s%> to Moses, <S%H4872><s%> Now <S%H6258><s%> shall you see <S%H7200><s%> what <S%H834><s%> I will do <S%H6213><s%> to Pharaoh: <S%H6547><s%> for with a strong <S%H2389><s%> hand <S%H3027><s%> shall he let them go, <S%H7971><s%> and with a strong <S%H2389><s%> hand <S%H3027><s%> shall he drive <S%H1644><s%> them out of his land. <S%H776><s%>
And God <S%H430><s%> spoke <S%H1696><s%> to Moses, <S%H4872><s%> and said <S%H559><s%> to him, I am the LORD: <S%H3068><s%>

And I appeared <S%H7200><s%> to Abraham, <S%H85><s%> to Isaac, <S%H3327><s%> and to Jacob, <S%H3290><s%> by the name of God <S%H410><s%> Almighty, <S%H7706><s%> but by my name <S%H8034><s%> JEHOVAH <S%H3068><s%> was I not known <S%H3045><s%> to them.

And I have also <S%H1571><s%> established <S%H6965><s%> my covenant <S%H1285><s%> with them, to give <S%H5414><s%> them the land <S%H776><s%> of Canaan, <S%H3667><s%> the land <S%H776><s%> of their pilgrimage, <S%H4033><s%> wherein <S%H834><s%> they were strangers. <S%H1481><s%>

And I have also <S%H1571><s%> heard <S%H8085><s%> the groaning <S%H5009><s%> of the children <S%H1121><s%> of Israel, <S%H3478><s%> whom <S%H834><s%> the Egyptians <S%H4714><s%> keep in bondage; <S%H5647><s%> and I have remembered <S%H2142><s%> my covenant. <S%H1285><s%>

Why <S%H3651><s%> say <S%H559><s%> to the children <S%H1121><s%> of Israel, <S%H3478><s%> I am the LORD, <S%H3068><s%> and I will bring <S%H3318><s%> you out from under <S%H8478><s%> the burdens <S%H5450><s%> of the Egyptians, <S%H4714><s%> and I will rid <S%H5337><s%> you out of their bondage, <S%H5656><s%> and I will redeem <S%H1350><s%> you with a stretched <S%H5186><s%> out arm, <S%H2220><s%> and with great <S%H1419><s%> judgments: <S%H8201><s%>

And I will take <S%H3947><s%> you to me for a people, <S%H5971><s%> and I will be to you a God: <S%H430><s%> and you shall know <S%H3045><s%> that I am the LORD <S%H3068><s%> your God, <S%H430><s%> which brings <S%H3318><s%> you out from under <S%H8478><s%> the burdens <S%H5450><s%> of the Egyptians. <S%H4714><s%>

And I will bring <S%H935><s%> you in to the land, <S%H776><s%> concerning the which <S%H834><s%> I did swear <S%H5375><s%> to give <S%H5414><s%> it to Abraham, <S%H85><s%> to Isaac, <S%H3327><s%> and to Jacob; <S%H3290><s%> and I will give <S%H5414><s%> it you for an heritage: <S%H4181><s%> I am the LORD. <S%H3068><s%>

And Moses <S%H4872><s%> spoke <S%H1696><s%> so <S%H3651><s%> to the children <S%H1121><s%> of Israel: <S%H3478><s%> but they listened <S%H8085><s%> not to Moses <S%H4872><s%> for anguish <S%H7115><s%> of spirit, <S%H7307><s%> and for cruel <S%H7185><s%> bondage. <S%H5656><s%>
And the LORD <S%H3068><s%> spoke <S%H1696><s%> to Moses, <S%H4872><s%> saying, <S%H559><s%>

Go <S%H935><s%> in, speak <S%H1696><s%> to Pharaoh <S%H6547><s%> king <S%H4428><s%> of Egypt, <S%H4714><s%> that he let the children <S%H1121><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%> go <S%H7971><s%> out of his land. <S%H776><s%>

And Moses <S%H4872><s%> spoke <S%H1696><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> the LORD, <S%H3068><s%> saying, <S%H559><s%> Behold, <S%H2005><s%> the children <S%H1121><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%> have not listened <S%H8085><s%> to me; how <S%H349><s%> then shall Pharaoh <S%H6547><s%> hear <S%H8085><s%> me, who <S%H589><s%> am of uncircumcised <S%H6189><s%> lips? <S%H8193><s%>

And the LORD <S%H3068><s%> spoke <S%H1696><s%> to Moses <S%H4872><s%> and to Aaron, <S%H175><s%> and gave them a charge <S%H6680><s%> to the children <S%H1121><s%> of Israel, <S%H3478><s%> and to Pharaoh <S%H6547><s%> king <S%H4428><s%> of Egypt, <S%H4714><s%> to bring <S%H935><s%> the children <S%H1121><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%> out of the land <S%H776><s%> of Egypt. <S%H4714><s%>

These <S%H428><s%> be the heads <S%H7218><s%> of their fathers' <S%H1><s%>houses: <S%H1004><s%> The sons <S%H1121><s%> of Reuben <S%H7205><s%> the firstborn <S%H1060><s%> of Israel; <S%H3478><s%> Hanoch, <S%H2585><s%> and Pallu, <S%H6396><s%> Hezron, <S%H2696><s%> and Carmi: <S%H3756><s%> these <S%H428><s%> be the families <S%H4940><s%> of Reuben. <S%H7205><s%>

And the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Simeon; <S%H8095><s%> Jemuel, <S%H3223><s%> and Jamin, <S%H3226><s%> and Ohad, <S%H161><s%> and Jachin, <S%H3199><s%> and Zohar, <S%H6714><s%> and Shaul <S%H7586><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of a Canaanitish <S%H3669><s%> woman: these <S%H428><s%> are the families <S%H4940><s%> of Simeon. <S%H8095><s%>

And these <S%H428><s%> are the names <S%H8034><s%> of the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Levi <S%H3878><s%> according to their generations; <S%H8435><s%> Gershon, <S%H1647><s%> and Kohath, <S%H6955><s%> and Merari: <S%H4847><s%> and the years <S%H8141><s%> of the life <S%H2416><s%> of Levi <S%H3878><s%> were an hundred <S%H3967><s%> thirty <S%H7970><s%> and seven <S%H7651><s%> years. <S%H8141><s%>
The sons <S%H1121><s%> of Gershon; <S%H1647><s%> Libni, <S%H3845><s%> and Shimi, <S%H8096><s%> according to their families. <S%H4940><s%>

And the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Kohath; <S%H6955><s%> Amram, <S%H6019><s%> and Izhar, <S%H3324><s%> and Hebron, <S%H2275><s%> and Uzziel: <S%H5816><s%> and the years <S%H8141><s%> of the life <S%H2416><s%> of Kohath <S%H6955><s%> were an hundred <S%H3967><s%> thirty <S%H7970><s%> and three <S%H7969><s%> years. <S%H8141><s%>

And the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Merari; <S%H4847><s%> Mahali <S%H4249><s%> and Mushi: <S%H4187><s%> these <S%H428><s%> are the families <S%H4940><s%> of Levi <S%H3878><s%> according to their generations. <S%H8435><s%>

And Amram <S%H6019><s%> took <S%H3947><s%> him Jochebed <S%H3115><s%> his father's <S%H1733><s%> sister <S%H1733><s%> to wife; <S%H802><s%> and she bore <S%H3205><s%> him Aaron <S%H175><s%> and Moses: <S%H4872><s%> and the years <S%H8141><s%> of the life <S%H2416><s%> of Amram <S%H6019><s%> were an hundred <S%H3967><s%> and thirty <S%H7970><s%> and seven <S%H7651><s%> years. <S%H8141><s%>
And the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Izhar; <S%H3324><s%> Korah, <S%H7141><s%> and Nepheg, <S%H5298><s%> and Zichri. <S%H2147><s%>
And the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Uzziel; <S%H5816><s%> Mishael, <S%H4332><s%> and Elzaphan, <S%H469><s%> and Zithri. <S%H5644><s%>

And Aaron <S%H175><s%> took <S%H3947><s%> him Elisheba, <S%H472><s%> daughter <S%H1323><s%> of Amminadab, <S%H5992><s%> sister <S%H269><s%> of Naashon, <S%H5177><s%> to wife; <S%H802><s%> and she bore <S%H3205><s%> him Nadab, <S%H5070><s%> and Abihu, <S%H30><s%> Eleazar, <S%H499><s%> and Ithamar. <S%H385><s%>

And the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Korah; <S%H7141><s%> Assir, <S%H617><s%> and Elkanah, <S%H511><s%> and Abiasaph: <S%H23><s%> these <S%H428><s%> are the families <S%H4940><s%> of the Korhites. <S%H7145><s%>

And Eleazar <S%H499><s%> Aaron's <S%H175><s%> son <S%H1121><s%> took <S%H3947><s%> him one of the daughters <S%H1323><s%> of Putiel <S%H6317><s%> to wife; <S%H802><s%> and she bore <S%H3205><s%> him Phinehas: <S%H6372><s%> these <S%H428><s%> are the heads <S%H7218><s%> of the fathers <S%H1><s%> of the Levites <S%H3881><s%> according to their families. <S%H4940><s%>

These <S%H1931><s%> are that Aaron <S%H175><s%> and Moses, <S%H4872><s%> to whom <S%H834><s%> the LORD <S%H3068><s%> said, <S%H559><s%> Bring <S%H3318><s%> out the children <S%H1121><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%> from the land <S%H776><s%> of Egypt <S%H4714><s%> according <S%H5921><s%> to their armies. <S%H6635><s%>

These <S%H1931><s%> are they which spoke <S%H1696><s%> to Pharaoh <S%H6547><s%> king <S%H4428><s%> of Egypt, <S%H4714><s%> to bring <S%H3318><s%> out the children <S%H1121><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%> from Egypt: <S%H4714><s%> these <S%H1992><s%> are that Moses <S%H4872><s%> and Aaron. <S%H175><s%>
And it came <S%H1961><s%> to pass on the day <S%H3117><s%> when the LORD <S%H3068><s%> spoke <S%H1696><s%> to Moses <S%H4872><s%> in the land <S%H776><s%> of Egypt, <S%H4714><s%>

That the LORD <S%H3068><s%> spoke <S%H1696><s%> to Moses, <S%H4872><s%> saying, <S%H559><s%> I am the LORD: <S%H3068><s%> speak <S%H1696><s%> you to Pharaoh <S%H6547><s%> king <S%H4428><s%> of Egypt <S%H4714><s%> all <S%H3605><s%> that I say <S%H1696><s%> to you.

And Moses <S%H4872><s%> said <S%H559><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> the LORD, <S%H3068><s%> Behold, <S%H2005><s%> I am of uncircumcised <S%H6189><s%> lips, <S%H8193><s%> and how <S%H349><s%> shall Pharaoh <S%H6547><s%> listen <S%H8085><s%> to me?
